**Title:** Rovr Config

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                         | Type            | Title/Description                                |
| -------------------------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
|   [interface](#interface )       | object          |                                                  |
|   [settings](#settings )         | object          |                                                  |
|   [metadata](#metadata )         | object          |                                                  |
|   [icons](#icons )               | object          | Custom icon configurations for files and folders |
|   [theme](#theme )               | object          |                                                  |
|   [custom_theme](#custom_theme ) | array of object |                                                  |
|   [keybinds](#keybinds )         | object          |                                                  |
|   [plugins](#plugins )           | object          |                                                  |

## <a name="interface"></a>1. Property `Rovr Config > interface`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                                                 | Type    | Title/Description                                                                                                         |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   [tooltips](#interface_tooltips )                                       | boolean | Show tooltips when your mouse is over a tooltip supported button.<br />This is not hot reloaded.                          |
|   [nerd_font](#interface_nerd_font )                                     | boolean | Use nerd font for rendering icons instead of weird characters and stuff.<br />Not properly hot-reloaded.                  |
|   [use_reactive_layout](#interface_use_reactive_layout )                   | boolean | Hide certain elements based on the width and height of the terminal.                                                      |
|   [show_progress_eta](#interface_show_progress_eta )                     | boolean | When copying or deleting files, show an ETA for when the action will be completed.                                        |
|   [show_progress_percentage](#interface_show_progress_percentage )       | boolean | When copying or deleting files, show a percentage of how much had been completed.                                         |
|   [truncate_progress_file_path](#interface_truncate_progress_file_path ) | boolean | When the process container is using file paths, truncate the file path to only view the first and last names of the path. |
|   [preview_error](#interface_preview_error )                             | string  | If for any reason the file preview refused to show, this appears.                                                         |
|   [preview_binary](#interface_preview_binary )                           | string  | If the current file cannot be read due to an encoding issue (ie not UTF8), it will display this message.                  |
|   [preview_start](#interface_preview_start )                             | string  | This is shown when the rovr starts up. You may see it for a split second, but it will never appear afterwards.            |
|   [clock](#interface_clock )                                             | object  |                                                                                                                           |

### <a name="interface_tooltips"></a>1.1. Property `Rovr Config > interface > tooltips`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `true`    |

**Description:** Show tooltips when your mouse is over a tooltip supported button.
This is not hot reloaded.

### <a name="interface_nerd_font"></a>1.2. Property `Rovr Config > interface > nerd_font`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** Use nerd font for rendering icons instead of weird characters and stuff.
Not properly hot-reloaded.

### <a name="interface_use_reactive_layout"></a>1.3. Property `Rovr Config > interface > use_reactive_layout`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `true`    |

**Description:** Hide certain elements based on the width and height of the terminal.

### <a name="interface_show_progress_eta"></a>1.4. Property `Rovr Config > interface > show_progress_eta`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** When copying or deleting files, show an ETA for when the action will be completed.

### <a name="interface_show_progress_percentage"></a>1.5. Property `Rovr Config > interface > show_progress_percentage`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** When copying or deleting files, show a percentage of how much had been completed.

### <a name="interface_truncate_progress_file_path"></a>1.6. Property `Rovr Config > interface > truncate_progress_file_path`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** When the process container is using file paths, truncate the file path to only view the first and last names of the path.

### <a name="interface_preview_error"></a>1.7. Property `Rovr Config > interface > preview_error`

|              |                                                          |
| ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Type**     | `string`                                                 |
| **Required** | No                                                       |
| **Default**  | `"Hmm, I think this file got corrupted (or maybe not?)"` |

**Description:** If for any reason the file preview refused to show, this appears.

### <a name="interface_preview_binary"></a>1.8. Property `Rovr Config > interface > preview_binary`

|              |                                                              |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **Type**     | `string`                                                     |
| **Required** | No                                                           |
| **Default**  | `"This file is not UTF-8 encoded, so I decline to read it."` |

**Description:** If the current file cannot be read due to an encoding issue (ie not UTF8), it will display this message.

### <a name="interface_preview_start"></a>1.9. Property `Rovr Config > interface > preview_start`

|              |                              |
| ------------ | ---------------------------- |
| **Type**     | `string`                     |
| **Required** | No                           |
| **Default**  | `"print(\"Hello, world!\")"` |

**Description:** This is shown when the rovr starts up. You may see it for a split second, but it will never appear afterwards.

### <a name="interface_clock"></a>1.10. Property `Rovr Config > interface > clock`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                               | Type             | Title/Description                                                |
| -------------------------------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   [enabled](#interface_clock_enabled ) | boolean          | Show a clock in the tabs bar.                                    |
|   [align](#interface_clock_align )     | enum (of string) | Align the clock to either the 'right' or 'left' of the tabs bar. |

#### <a name="interface_clock_enabled"></a>1.10.1. Property `Rovr Config > interface > clock > enabled`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `true`    |

**Description:** Show a clock in the tabs bar.

#### <a name="interface_clock_align"></a>1.10.2. Property `Rovr Config > interface > clock > align`

|              |                    |
| ------------ | ------------------ |
| **Type**     | `enum (of string)` |
| **Required** | No                 |
| **Default**  | `"right"`          |

**Description:** Align the clock to either the 'right' or 'left' of the tabs bar.

Must be one of:
* "left"
* "right"

## <a name="settings"></a>2. Property `Rovr Config > settings`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                                      | Type             | Title/Description                                                                                                                                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   [use_recycle_bin](#settings_use_recycle_bin )               | boolean          | When deleting a file, allow moving the file to the recycle bin.                                                                                                        |
|   [copy_includes_metadata](#settings_copy_includes_metadata ) | boolean          | When copying over a file, preserve metadata from the original file, such as creation and modification times.                                                           |
|   [image_protocol](#settings_image_protocol )                 | enum (of string) | The image protocol to use when displaying an image                                                                                                                     |
|   [preview_full](#settings_preview_full )                     | boolean          | Whether or not you want to view the full file. It sort of works, not sure why it doesnt properly work, looking into it.                                                |
|   [allow_tab_nav](#settings_allow_tab_nav )                   | boolean          | Allow navigating the main app screen with \`tab\` and \`shift+tab\`                                                                                                    |
|   [append_new_tabs](#settings_append_new_tabs )               | boolean          | Choose whether or not to append new tabs instead of inserting them.<br />\`true\` => Append to the end of the tab list.<br />\`false\` => Insert after the active tab. |
|   [cd_on_quit](#settings_cd_on_quit )                         | boolean          | When quitting rovr, write the current directory to a file, so that you can cd into it.                                                                                 |

### <a name="settings_use_recycle_bin"></a>2.1. Property `Rovr Config > settings > use_recycle_bin`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `true`    |

**Description:** When deleting a file, allow moving the file to the recycle bin.

### <a name="settings_copy_includes_metadata"></a>2.2. Property `Rovr Config > settings > copy_includes_metadata`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `true`    |

**Description:** When copying over a file, preserve metadata from the original file, such as creation and modification times.

### <a name="settings_image_protocol"></a>2.3. Property `Rovr Config > settings > image_protocol`

|              |                    |
| ------------ | ------------------ |
| **Type**     | `enum (of string)` |
| **Required** | No                 |
| **Default**  | `"Auto"`           |

**Description:** The image protocol to use when displaying an image

Must be one of:
* "Auto"
* "TGP"
* "Sixel"
* "Halfcell"
* "Unicode"

### <a name="settings_preview_full"></a>2.4. Property `Rovr Config > settings > preview_full`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** Whether or not you want to view the full file. It sort of works, not sure why it doesnt properly work, looking into it.

### <a name="settings_allow_tab_nav"></a>2.5. Property `Rovr Config > settings > allow_tab_nav`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** Allow navigating the main app screen with `tab` and `shift+tab`

### <a name="settings_append_new_tabs"></a>2.6. Property `Rovr Config > settings > append_new_tabs`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `true`    |

**Description:** Choose whether or not to append new tabs instead of inserting them.
`true` => Append to the end of the tab list.
`false` => Insert after the active tab.

### <a name="settings_cd_on_quit"></a>2.7. Property `Rovr Config > settings > cd_on_quit`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** When quitting rovr, write the current directory to a file, so that you can cd into it.

## <a name="metadata"></a>3. Property `Rovr Config > metadata`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                            | Type                      | Title/Description                                                                                                             |
| --------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   [fields](#metadata_fields )                       | array of enum (of string) | The order of the metadata tags that you want to see in the Metadata section.                                                  |
|   [datetime_format](#metadata_datetime_format )     | string                    | The datetime format for Metadata. Refer to https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#format-codes for more information. |
|   [filesize_decimals](#metadata_filesize_decimals ) | integer                   | The number of decimals you want to see in the humanized file size                                                             |
|   [filesize_suffix](#metadata_filesize_suffix )     | enum (of string)          | The filesize suffix to follow.<br />\`decimal\`: 1024 -> 1.024kB<br />\`binary\`: 1024 -> 1KiB<br />\`gnu\`: 1024 -> 1K       |

### <a name="metadata_fields"></a>3.1. Property `Rovr Config > metadata > fields`

|              |                                                                      |
| ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Type**     | `array of enum (of string)`                                          |
| **Required** | No                                                                   |
| **Default**  | `["type", "permissions", "size", "modified", "accessed", "created"]` |

**Description:** The order of the metadata tags that you want to see in the Metadata section.

|                      | Array restrictions |
| -------------------- | ------------------ |
| **Min items**        | N/A                |
| **Max items**        | N/A                |
| **Items unicity**    | False              |
| **Additional items** | False              |
| **Tuple validation** | See below          |

| Each item of this array must be        | Description |
| -------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| [fields items](#metadata_fields_items) |             |

#### <a name="metadata_fields_items"></a>3.1.1. Rovr Config > metadata > fields > fields items

|              |                    |
| ------------ | ------------------ |
| **Type**     | `enum (of string)` |
| **Required** | No                 |

Must be one of:
* "type"
* "permissions"
* "size"
* "modified"
* "accessed"
* "created"

### <a name="metadata_datetime_format"></a>3.2. Property `Rovr Config > metadata > datetime_format`

|              |                    |
| ------------ | ------------------ |
| **Type**     | `string`           |
| **Required** | No                 |
| **Default**  | `"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M"` |

**Description:** The datetime format for Metadata. Refer to https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#format-codes for more information.

### <a name="metadata_filesize_decimals"></a>3.3. Property `Rovr Config > metadata > filesize_decimals`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `integer` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `1`       |

**Description:** The number of decimals you want to see in the humanized file size

### <a name="metadata_filesize_suffix"></a>3.4. Property `Rovr Config > metadata > filesize_suffix`

|              |                    |
| ------------ | ------------------ |
| **Type**     | `enum (of string)` |
| **Required** | No                 |
| **Default**  | `"decimal"`        |

**Description:** The filesize suffix to follow.
`decimal`: 1024 -> 1.024kB
`binary`: 1024 -> 1KiB
`gnu`: 1024 -> 1K

Must be one of:
* "decimal"
* "binary"
* "gnu"

## <a name="icons"></a>4. Property `Rovr Config > icons`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

**Description:** Custom icon configurations for files and folders

| Property                     | Type            | Title/Description                                                  |
| ---------------------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   [files](#icons_files )     | array of object | Custom file icon mappings. Earlier entries have higher priority.   |
|   [folders](#icons_folders ) | array of object | Custom folder icon mappings. Earlier entries have higher priority. |

### <a name="icons_files"></a>4.1. Property `Rovr Config > icons > files`

|              |                   |
| ------------ | ----------------- |
| **Type**     | `array of object` |
| **Required** | No                |
| **Default**  | `[]`              |

**Description:** Custom file icon mappings. Earlier entries have higher priority.

|                      | Array restrictions |
| -------------------- | ------------------ |
| **Min items**        | N/A                |
| **Max items**        | N/A                |
| **Items unicity**    | False              |
| **Additional items** | False              |
| **Tuple validation** | See below          |

| Each item of this array must be   | Description |
| --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| [files items](#icons_files_items) |             |

#### <a name="icons_files_items"></a>4.1.1. Rovr Config > icons > files > files items

|                           |                  |
| ------------------------- | ---------------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`         |
| **Required**              | No               |
| **Additional properties** | Any type allowed |

| Property                                       | Type             | Title/Description                                                                                                     |
| ---------------------------------------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   [pattern](#icons_files_items_pattern )       | string           | The file name pattern to match                                                                                        |
|   [match_type](#icons_files_items_match_type ) | enum (of string) | Type of matching:<br />\`exact\`   : for exact file name matching<br />\`endswith\`: for file name ends with matching |
|   [icon](#icons_files_items_icon )             | string           | The icon character to use.                                                                                            |
|   [color](#icons_files_items_color )           | string           | The color for the icon. Can be a named color or hex code.                                                             |

##### <a name="icons_files_items_pattern"></a>4.1.1.1. Property `Rovr Config > icons > files > files items > pattern`

|              |          |
| ------------ | -------- |
| **Type**     | `string` |
| **Required** | Yes      |

**Description:** The file name pattern to match

##### <a name="icons_files_items_match_type"></a>4.1.1.2. Property `Rovr Config > icons > files > files items > match_type`

|              |                    |
| ------------ | ------------------ |
| **Type**     | `enum (of string)` |
| **Required** | Yes                |
| **Default**  | `"exact"`          |

**Description:** Type of matching:
`exact`   : for exact file name matching
`endswith`: for file name ends with matching

Must be one of:
* "exact"
* "endswith"

##### <a name="icons_files_items_icon"></a>4.1.1.3. Property `Rovr Config > icons > files > files items > icon`

|              |          |
| ------------ | -------- |
| **Type**     | `string` |
| **Required** | Yes      |

**Description:** The icon character to use.

##### <a name="icons_files_items_color"></a>4.1.1.4. Property `Rovr Config > icons > files > files items > color`

|              |          |
| ------------ | -------- |
| **Type**     | `string` |
| **Required** | Yes      |

**Description:** The color for the icon. Can be a named color or hex code.

|              |                   |

### <a name="custom_theme_items"></a>6.1. Rovr Config > custom_theme > custom_theme items

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                            | Type    | Title/Description                                                                                                                                    |
| --------------------------------------------------- | ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   [name](#custom_theme_items_name )                 | string  | A name for the theme. However, when the theme is available in the theme picker, it shows up as a hiphenated, lowercase version.                      |
|   [primary](#custom_theme_items_primary )           | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the primary color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.    |
|   [secondary](#custom_theme_items_secondary )       | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the secondary color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.  |
|   [warning](#custom_theme_items_warning )           | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the warning color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.    |
|   [error](#custom_theme_items_error )               | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the error color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.      |
|   [success](#custom_theme_items_success )           | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the success color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.    |
|   [accent](#custom_theme_items_accent )             | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the accent color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.     |
|   [foreground](#custom_theme_items_foreground )     | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the foreground color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors. |
|   [background](#custom_theme_items_background )     | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the background color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors. |
|   [surface](#custom_theme_items_surface )           | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the surface color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.    |
|   [panel](#custom_theme_items_panel )               | string  | A hex code or named color to use as the panel color. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.      |
|   [bar_gradient](#custom_theme_items_bar_gradient ) | object  | The gradient colors for the progress bar.                                                                                                            |
|   [is_dark](#custom_theme_items_is_dark )           | boolean | Whether or not this theme is a dark type theme.                                                                                                      |
|   [variables](#custom_theme_items_variables )       | object  | Extra variables to set unique to the theme.<br />Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/guide/design/#additional-variables for more information.     |

**Description:** A list of hex codes, or named colors to use as the progress bar's gradient colors **when it encountered an error**. Refer to https://textual.textualize.io/css_types/color/#named-colors for the named colors.

|                      | Array restrictions |

| **Min items**        | N/A                |
| **Max items**        | N/A                |
| **Items unicity**    | False              |
| **Additional items** | False              |
| **Tuple validation** | N/A                |

#### <a name="custom_theme_items_is_dark"></a>6.1.13. Property `Rovr Config > custom_theme > custom_theme items > is_dark`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | Yes       |

**Description:** Whether or not this theme is a dark type theme.

## <a name="keybinds"></a>7. Property `Rovr Config > keybinds`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                                                  | Type            | Title/Description                                                                                                              |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   [toggle_pin](#keybinds_toggle_pin )                                     | array of string | Toggle the current folder in the Pinned Folder Sidebar.                                                                        |
|   [toggle_pinned_sidebar](#keybinds_toggle_pinned_sidebar )               | array of string | Toggle viewing the pinned sidebar.                                                                                             |
|   [toggle_preview_sidebar](#keybinds_toggle_preview_sidebar )             | array of string | Toggle viewing the preview sidebar.                                                                                            |
|   [toggle_footer](#keybinds_toggle_footer )                               | array of string | Toggle viewing the footer.                                                                                                     |
|   [focus_toggle_pinned_sidebar](#keybinds_focus_toggle_pinned_sidebar )   | array of string | Toggle focus between pinned folder sidebar and file list.                                                                      |
|   [focus_file_list](#keybinds_focus_file_list )                           | array of string | Focus the file list.                                                                                                           |
|   [focus_toggle_preview_sidebar](#keybinds_focus_toggle_preview_sidebar ) | array of string | Focus toggle between preview sidebar and file list.                                                                            |
|   [focus_toggle_path_switcher](#keybinds_focus_toggle_path_switcher )     | array of string | Focus toggle between path switcher and file list.                                                                              |
|   [focus_toggle_processes](#keybinds_focus_toggle_processes )             | array of string | Focus toggle the processes container.                                                                                          |
|   [focus_toggle_clipboard](#keybinds_focus_toggle_clipboard )             | array of string | Focus toggle the clipboard container.                                                                                          |
|   [focus_toggle_metadata](#keybinds_focus_toggle_metadata )               | array of string | Focus toggle the metadata container.                                                                                           |
|   [focus_search](#keybinds_focus_search )                                 | array of string | Focus the search bar.                                                                                                          |
|   [copy](#keybinds_copy )                                                 | array of string | Copy the selected files in the file list to the clipboard.                                                                     |
|   [paste](#keybinds_paste )                                               | array of string | Paste the selected files in the clipboard into the current directory.                                                          |
|   [cut](#keybinds_cut )                                                   | array of string | Cut the selected files in the file list to the clipboard.                                                                      |
|   [delete](#keybinds_delete )                                             | array of string | Delete the selected files in the file list.                                                                                    |
|   [rename](#keybinds_rename )                                             | array of string | Rename the selected file in the file list to something else.                                                                   |
|   [new](#keybinds_new )                                                   | array of string | Create a new item in the current directory.                                                                                    |
|   [toggle_all](#keybinds_toggle_all )                                     | array of string | Enter into select mode and select/unselect everything.                                                                         |
|   [zip](#keybinds_zip )                                                   | array of string | Create a zip archive from selected files.                                                                                      |
|   [unzip](#keybinds_unzip )                                               | array of string | Extract a selected zip archive.                                                                                                |
|   [copy_path](#keybinds_copy_path )                                       | array of string | Copy the path of the item to the system clipboard.                                                                             |
|   [up](#keybinds_up )                                                     | array of string | Go up the file list options.                                                                                                   |
|   [down](#keybinds_down )                                                 | array of string | Go down the file list options.                                                                                                 |
|   [up_tree](#keybinds_up_tree )                                           | array of string | Go up the file tree.                                                                                                           |
|   [down_tree](#keybinds_down_tree )                                       | array of string | Go down the file tree, or open the currently selected item.                                                                    |
|   [page_up](#keybinds_page_up )                                           | array of string | Page Up in the file list options.                                                                                              |
|   [page_down](#keybinds_page_down )                                       | array of string | Page Down in the file list options.                                                                                            |
|   [home](#keybinds_home )                                                 | array of string | Go to the first option in the file list options.                                                                               |
|   [end](#keybinds_end )                                                   | array of string | Go to the last option in the file list options.                                                                                |
|   [hist_previous](#keybinds_hist_previous )                               | array of string | Go back in history.                                                                                                            |
|   [hist_next](#keybinds_hist_next )                                       | array of string | Go forward in history.                                                                                                         |
|   [toggle_visual](#keybinds_toggle_visual )                               | array of string | Enter or exit select/visual mode.                                                                                              |
|   [select_up](#keybinds_select_up )                                       | array of string | While in visual mode, extend the selection up.                                                                                 |
|   [select_down](#keybinds_select_down )                                   | array of string | While in visual mode, extend the selection down.                                                                               |
|   [select_page_up](#keybinds_select_page_up )                             | array of string | While in visual mode, extend the selection to the previous page.                                                               |
|   [select_page_down](#keybinds_select_page_down )                         | array of string | While in visual mode, extend the selection to the next page.                                                                   |
|   [select_home](#keybinds_select_home )                                   | array of string | While in visual mode, extend the selection to the first option.                                                                |
|   [select_end](#keybinds_select_end )                                     | array of string | While in visual mode, extend the selection to the last option.                                                                 |
|   [tab_next](#keybinds_tab_next )                                         | array of string | Go to the next tab, if it is available.                                                                                        |
|   [tab_previous](#keybinds_tab_previous )                                 | array of string | Go to the previous tab, if it is available.                                                                                    |
|   [tab_new](#keybinds_tab_new )                                           | array of string | Create a new tab.                                                                                                              |
|   [tab_close](#keybinds_tab_close )                                       | array of string | Close the current tab.                                                                                                         |
|   [preview_scroll_left](#keybinds_preview_scroll_left )                   | array of string | While using \`settings.preview_full = true\`, and the preview container is focused, scroll left when this keybind is pressed.  |
|   [preview_scroll_right](#keybinds_preview_scroll_right )                 | array of string | While using \`settings.preview_full = true\`, and the preview container is focused, scroll right when this keybind is pressed. |
|   [preview_select_right](#keybinds_preview_select_right )                 | array of string | While using TextArea for previewing, use this keybind to extend selection to the right.                                        |
|   [preview_select_left](#keybinds_preview_select_left )                   | array of string | While using TextArea for previewing, use this keybind to extend selection to the left.                                         |

## <a name="plugins"></a>8. Property `Rovr Config > plugins`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                         | Type   | Title/Description |
| -------------------------------- | ------ | ----------------- |
|   [zoxide](#plugins_zoxide )     | object |                   |
|   [bat](#plugins_bat )           | object |                   |
|   [editor](#plugins_editor )     | object |                   |
|   [zen_mode](#plugins_zen_mode ) | object |                   |

### <a name="plugins_zoxide"></a>8.1. Property `Rovr Config > plugins > zoxide`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                | Type            | Title/Description                     |
| --------------------------------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------- |
|   [enabled](#plugins_zoxide_enabled )   | boolean         | Enable or disable zoxide travelling.  |
|   [keybinds](#plugins_zoxide_keybinds ) | array of string | The keybind to open the zoxide modal. |

#### <a name="plugins_zoxide_enabled"></a>8.1.1. Property `Rovr Config > plugins > zoxide > enabled`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** Enable or disable zoxide travelling.

#### <a name="plugins_zoxide_keybinds"></a>8.1.2. Property `Rovr Config > plugins > zoxide > keybinds`

|              |                   |
| ------------ | ----------------- |
| **Type**     | `array of string` |
| **Required** | No                |
| **Default**  | `["z"]`           |

**Description:** The keybind to open the zoxide modal.

|                      | Array restrictions |
| -------------------- | ------------------ |
| **Min items**        | N/A                |
| **Max items**        | N/A                |
| **Items unicity**    | False              |
| **Additional items** | False              |
| **Tuple validation** | See below          |

| Each item of this array must be                  | Description |
| ------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| [keybinds items](#plugins_zoxide_keybinds_items) |             |

##### <a name="plugins_zoxide_keybinds_items"></a>8.1.2.1. Rovr Config > plugins > zoxide > keybinds > keybinds items

|              |          |
| ------------ | -------- |
| **Type**     | `string` |
| **Required** | No       |

### <a name="plugins_bat"></a>8.2. Property `Rovr Config > plugins > bat`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                               | Type    | Title/Description                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------ | ------- | ------------------------------------------- |
|   [enabled](#plugins_bat_enabled )                     | boolean | Enable or disable bat for previewing files. |
|   [executable](#plugins_bat_executable )               | string  | The executable for bat.                     |
|   [show_line_numbers](#plugins_bat_show_line_numbers ) | boolean | Make batcat show line numbers.              |

| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `true`    |

**Description:** Make batcat show line numbers.

### <a name="plugins_editor"></a>8.3. Property `Rovr Config > plugins > editor`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                                  | Type            | Title/Description                     |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------- |
|   [enabled](#plugins_editor_enabled )                     | boolean         | Enable opening a file in your editor. |
|   [file_executable](#plugins_editor_file_executable )     | string          | Open files in this app.               |
|   [folder_executable](#plugins_editor_folder_executable ) | string          | Open folders in this app.             |
|   [keybinds](#plugins_editor_keybinds )                   | array of string | The keybind to launch your editor.    |

### <a name="plugins_zen_mode"></a>8.4. Property `Rovr Config > plugins > zen_mode`

|                           |             |
| ------------------------- | ----------- |
| **Type**                  | `object`    |
| **Required**              | No          |
| **Additional properties** | Not allowed |

| Property                                  | Type            | Title/Description                                                                                    |
| ----------------------------------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   [enabled](#plugins_zen_mode_enabled )   | boolean         | Allow enabling or disabling zen mode. Nothing shows up while in zen mode, except only the file list. |
|   [keybinds](#plugins_zen_mode_keybinds ) | array of string | The keybind to toggle zen mode.                                                                      |

#### <a name="plugins_zen_mode_enabled"></a>8.4.1. Property `Rovr Config > plugins > zen_mode > enabled`

|              |           |
| ------------ | --------- |
| **Type**     | `boolean` |
| **Required** | No        |
| **Default**  | `false`   |

**Description:** Allow enabling or disabling zen mode. Nothing shows up while in zen mode, except only the file list.

| ------------ | ----------------- |

| **Required** | No                |

| Each item of this array must be                    | Description |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
